rules_text:
Vigilance
{1}{W}, Exile Odd Ox from your graveyard: Surveil 2. [i](Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]
notes: -1 mana value, 3/4 —> 2/3, +mutant type, Exile from graveyard to gain research —> Exile from graveyard to gain 2 life and surveil 2.
